# target_desc

**Instance Property**

The descriptor—which is either an input query, key, or value, or an output—of the main target of the operation.

## Declaration

```swift
var target_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
```

## Instance Properties

- **weights**: The descriptor of the initial projection’s weights.
- **bias**: The descriptor of the initial projection’s bias.

items.description: The descriptor of the initial projection’s weights.
items.name: weights

items.description: The descriptor of the initial projection’s bias.
